questions.text: In how many different ways can the letters of the word DISPLAY be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2009)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word SMART be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2009)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word FORMULATE be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2008)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word GAMBLE be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2010)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word RIDDLED be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2006)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word CREATE be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2011)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word TOTAL be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2009)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word OFFICES be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2010)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word BANANA be arranged?
In how many different ways can the letters of the word WEDDING be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2008)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word INCREASE be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2009)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word ABSENTEE be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2006)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word AWARE be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2010)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word DAILY be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2008)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word RUMOUR be arranged?
In how many different ways can the letters of the word OPERATE be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2009)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word PUNCTUAL be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2009)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word CREAM be arranged? (Bank P.O., 2008)
Out of 5 men and 3 women, a committee of three members is to be formed so that it has 1 woman and 2 men. In how many different ways can it be done? (Bank P.O., 2009)
Out of 5 women and 4 men, a committee of three members is to be formed in such a way that at least one member is a woman. In how many different ways can it be done? (Bank P.O., 2009)

A committee of 5 members is to be formed out of 3 trainees, 4 professors, and 6 research associates. In how many different ways can this be done, if the committee should have 4 professors and 1 research associate or all 3 trainees and 2 professors? (S.B.I. P.O., 2010)

A committee of 5 members is to be formed out of 3 trainees, 4 professors, and 6 research associates. In how many different ways can this be done if the committee should have 2 trainees and 3 research associates? (S.B.I. P.O., 2010)
In how many ways can a committee of 4 people be chosen out of 8 people? (Bank P.O., 2007)
A committee of 5 members is to be formed by selecting out of 4 men and 5 women. In how many different ways the committee can be formed if it should have 2 men and 3 women? (Bank P.O., 2005)
A committee of 5 members is to be formed by selecting out of 4 men and 5 women. In how many different ways the committee can be formed if it should have at least 1 man? (Bank P.O., 2011)
In how many ways a committee consisting of 5 men and 6 women can be formed from 8 men and 10 women? (Bank P.O., 2009)
A select group of 4 is to be formed from 8 men and 6 women in such a way that the group must have at least 1 woman. In how many different ways can it be done? (Bank P.O., 2005)
From a group of 7 men and 6 women, 5 persons are to be selected to form a committee so that at least 3 men are there on the committee. In how many ways can it be done?
A box contains 2 white, 3 black and 4 red balls. In how many ways can 3 balls be drawn from the box, if at least 1 black ball is to be included in the draw?
In how many ways can a group of 5 men and 2 women be made out of a total of 7 men and 3 women?
In how many different ways can the letters of the word ENGINEERING be arranged?
In how many different ways can the letters of the word ALLAHABAD be arranged?
In how many different ways can the letters of the word JUDGE be arranged in such a way that the vowels always come together?
In how many different ways can the letters of the word AUCTION be arranged in such a way that the vowels always come together? (Bank P.O., 2010)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word SOFTWARE be arranged in such a way that the vowels always come together? (Bank P.O., 2009)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word OPTICAL be arranged in such a way that the vowels always come together?
In how many different ways can the letters of the word BANKING be arranged in such a way that the vowels always come together? (Bank P.O., 2009)
In how many different ways can the letters of the word CAPITAL be arranged so that the vowels always come together? (Bank P.O. 2012)
In how many ways can the letters of the word MATHEMATICS be arranged so that all the vowels always come together?
